title: Heaven Sent
description: When a plane crash transports two opposing political candidates--Regan Carmichael and Drew Daniels--back in time, Regan is transformed into Bronwyn Llangandfan, a woman desperate to kill her Norman husband--now Drew--and they are plunged into a world of honor, war, betrayal, uncontrollable passion, and eternal love. Original.
author: Marian Edwards
